item.title: What dojos are and how we run them at pyBCN
item.description:
Description

Núria Pujol/Ignasi Fosch - What dojos are and how we run them at pyBCN [EuroPython 2015] [20 July 2015] [Bilbao, Euskadi, Spain]

Coding dojos are a very good way to share coding knowledge among members in a community, and, at the same time, introduce people into the language and community. Sometimes, though, the typical approach to set coding dojos may prevent expert coders to join the session. This is the story of the pyBCN's dojos, so far.
item.dc:creator: Núria Pujol
